descript.value: SQL text для запросов к БД чеков Кристалл

sql_get_sum.value: SELECT (round(sum(amount/100.0), 2)) as SUMMA FROM public.erpi_purchase h WHERE h.operday = %s and %s is not null and h.shop = %s

sql_head_check.value: SET datestyle = "ISO, DMY"; SELECT h.id AS DOCIDCASH, h.saletime AS DOCDATE, 'SALE' AS DOCTYPE, h.shop AS EXTERNALOBJCHECKID, h.number AS NUMBER, (round(h.amount/100.0, 2)) AS DOCSUMM FROM public.erpi_purchase AS h WHERE h.operday = %s and h.shop = %s and %s is not null order by DOCIDCASH

sql_detail_check.value: SELECT P.id_purchase AS DOCIDCASH, cast(cast(P.goodscode as integer) as varchar(10)) AS WARESCODE, sum(P.count/1000.0) AS AMOUNT, P.costwithdiscount/100.0 AS PRICE, sum(P.amount/100.0)AS SUMMA FROM erpi_positions AS P WHERE P.id_purchase = %s group by P.id_purchase, P.goodscode, P.costwithdiscount
